timelineItems.text: That's surely Brazil as group winners now. No way Mexico will score 2 goals in 5 minutes #WorldCup #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Landry N'Guémo (Cameroon) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick.
Landry N'Guémo (Cameroon) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Fernandinho (Brazil).

timelineItems.name: Vincie Raphepele
timelineItems.text: I think Cameroon is supporting Brazil. They jus let them score. We can col them Camerinho. #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Oscar (Brazil).
Landry N'Guémo (Cameroon) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: adil
timelineItems.text: 9 goals in about 180 minutes. MADNESS! #Brazil2014

timelineItems.comment: Jean Makoun (Cameroon) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Luiz Gustavo (Brazil).
Attempt blocked. Vincent Aboubakar (Cameroon) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Henri Bedimo.
Corner,  Cameroon. Conceded by Marcelo.

timelineItems.name: Amanda Bell Wiig
timelineItems.text: My heart is breaking for Cameroon #WorldCup #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: PIYUSH ROUT
timelineItems.text: Its raining of Goals in #Brasilia #Recife to top the table GroupA #BRA #CMR #MEX #CRO #WorldCup2014 #Brazil2014 !

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Pierre Webó (Cameroon).
Dani Alves (Brazil) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.text: #BRA over #CMR 4-1 right now... Happy Brazilian crowd @StudioSquareNYC #WorldCup2014 #Brazil2014 http://t.co/LQCN6nzRrK

timelineItems.text: This simultaneous games thing isn't working for me. #howdoichoose #goalseverywhere #BRAvsCAM #MEXICOvsCROATIA #Brazil2014

timelineItems.text: #BRA over #CMR 4-1 right now... Happy Brazilian crowd @StudioSquareNYC #WorldCup2014 #Brazil2014 http://t.co/LQCN6nzRrK

timelineItems.name: Paul
timelineItems.text: 14 goals in 4 World Cup games this morning #Brazil2014 #BestWorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Willian (Brazil) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Marcelo.

timelineItems.name: Iksule
timelineItems.text: So finally, #Ochoa surrenders. Now only Nigeria's Enyeama is yet to concede a goal at #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: luckyal
timelineItems.text: Brazil r much better to watch now there not looking for Neymar all the time #BRAZIL2014

timelineItems.comment: Edgar Salli (Cameroon) wins a free kick on the right wing.
David Luiz (Brazil).
Attempt missed. Nicolas N'Koulou (Cameroon) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jean Makoun.

timelineItems.name: Iminem-isms
timelineItems.text: 108 goals scored in 36 games so far .,, #WorldCup2014 #Brazil2014 3 per game !!

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Cameroon 1, Brazil 4.
